WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
47 FOOT S/V BELLA SIGNORA, FOUR PERSONS ON BOARD, DISMASTED
AND ADRIFT VICINITY 15-05N 054-22W. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
PHONE: 59 659 670 9292, FAX: 59 659 663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
